name: vibe-stats
description: Monitor Claude and GitHub Copilot status with animated lightning bolt indicators and real-time updates
author: Todd Dube

scripts.prepare-release: npm run validate && npm run build:clean
scripts.release:patch: npm run prepare-release && echo 'Ready for GitHub Action release (patch)'
scripts.release:minor: npm run prepare-release && echo 'Ready for GitHub Action release (minor)'
scripts.release:major: npm run prepare-release && echo 'Ready for GitHub Action release (major)'
scripts.version:validate: node sync-version.js check && npm run about:check && npm run validate
